text:
Slobodan Praljak

(1945-2017)

Bosnian Croat general and war criminal (1945–2017) – Slobodan Praljak was born in Čapljina (City in Bosnia and Herzegovina) on January 2nd, 1945 and died in The Hague (City and municipality in the Netherlands, seat of the Dutch government) on November 29th, 2017 at the age of 72. Today Slobodan Praljak would be 79 years old.

Age how old was Slobodan Praljak when he died? 72 Slobodan Praljak died in 2017 at the age of 72.
